properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.api-url
properties.description: The ServiceNow REST API url

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.api-version
properties.description: The ServiceNow REST API version, default latest

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.configuration
properties.description: Component configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.servicenow.ServiceNowConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.date-format
properties.description: The date format used for Json serialization/deserialization

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.date-time-format
properties.description: The date-time format used for Json serialization/deserialization

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.display
properties.description: Set this parameter to true to return only scorecards where the indicator Display field is selected. Set this parameter to all to return scorecards with any Display field value. This parameter is true by default.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.display-value
properties.description: Return the display value (true), actual value (false), or both (all) for reference fields (default: false)

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the servicenow component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.exclude-reference-link
properties.description: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields (default: false)

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.favorites
properties.description: Set this parameter to true to return only scorecards that are favorites of the querying user.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.http-client-policy
properties.description: To configure http-client. The option is a org.apache.cxf.transports.http.configuration.HTTPClientPolicy type.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.include-aggregates
properties.description: Set this parameter to true to always return all available aggregates for an indicator, including when an aggregate has already been applied. If a value is not specified, this parameter defaults to false and returns no aggregates.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.include-available-aggregates
properties.description: Set this parameter to true to return all available aggregates for an indicator when no aggregate has been applied. If a value is not specified, this parameter defaults to false and returns no aggregates.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.include-available-breakdowns
properties.description: Set this parameter to true to return all available breakdowns for an indicator. If a value is not specified, this parameter defaults to false and returns no breakdowns.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.include-score-notes
properties.description: Set this parameter to true to return all notes associated with the score. The note element contains the note text as well as the author and timestamp when the note was added.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.include-scores
properties.description: Set this parameter to true to return all scores for a scorecard. If a value is not specified, this parameter defaults to false and returns only the most recent score value.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.input-display-value
properties.description: True to set raw value of input fields (default: false)

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.instance-name
properties.description: The ServiceNow instance name

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.key
properties.description: Set this parameter to true to return only scorecards for key indicators.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.mapper
properties.description: Sets Jackson's ObjectMapper to use for request/reply. The option is a com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper type.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.models
properties.description: Defines both request and response models

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.oauth-client-id
properties.description: OAuth2 ClientID

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.oauth-client-secret
properties.description: OAuth2 ClientSecret

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.oauth-token-url
properties.description: OAuth token Url

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.password
properties.description: ServiceNow account password, MUST be provided

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.per-page
properties.description: Enter the maximum number of scorecards each query can return. By default this value is 10, and the maximum is 100.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.proxy-authorization-policy
properties.description: To configure proxy authentication. The option is a org.apache.cxf.configuration.security.ProxyAuthorizationPolicy type.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.proxy-host
properties.description: The proxy host name

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.proxy-password
properties.description: Password for proxy authentication

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.proxy-port
properties.description: The proxy port number

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.proxy-user-name
properties.description: Username for proxy authentication

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.release
properties.description: The ServiceNow release to target, default to Helsinki See https://docs.servicenow.com

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.request-models
properties.description: Defines the request model

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.resource
properties.description: The default resource, can be overridden by header CamelServiceNowResource

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.response-models
properties.description: Defines the response model

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.retrieve-target-record-on-import
properties.description: Set this parameter to true to retrieve the target record when using import set api. The import set result is then replaced by the target record

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.sort-by
properties.description: Specify the value to use when sorting results. By default, queries sort records by value.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.sort-dir
properties.description: Specify the sort direction, ascending or descending. By default, queries sort records in descending order. Use sysparm_sortdir=asc to sort in ascending order.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.ssl-context-parameters
properties.description: To configure security using SSLContextParameters. See http://camel.apache.org/camel-configuration-utilities.html. The option is a org.apache.camel.support.jsse.SSLContextParameters type.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.suppress-auto-sys-field
properties.description: True to suppress auto generation of system fields (default: false)

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.suppress-pagination-header
properties.description: Set this value to true to remove the Link header from the response. The Link header allows you to request additional pages of data when the number of records matching your query exceeds the query limit

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.table
properties.description: The default table, can be overridden by header CamelServiceNowTable

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.target
properties.description: Set this parameter to true to return only scorecards that have a target.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.time-format
properties.description: The time format used for Json serialization/deserialization

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.top-level-only
properties.description: Gets only those categories whose parent is a catalog.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.use-global-ssl-context-parameters
properties.description: Enable usage of global SSL context parameters.

properties.name: camel.component.servicenow.user-name
properties.description: ServiceNow user account name, MUST be provided
